instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.message:
Hello :) 

Anyone has schematics/bw for 820-02382-06. I just received one that some office apple reseller told them was liquid damaged, but I didn't find anything that would indicate that. I don't have the MagSafe charger the client forgot to bring it, but when plugged in with type c 87W mac charger goes to 20v but no picture no fan spin. No shorted lines nothing heating up, checked also on the thermal cam. 

Any ideas?

Thanks :)
I made a detailed check and reconnect all flex cable powers on no backlight :)

I cannot identify any board with this code.

Did you check external video and USB activity?
It's a very new model A2485. No external video and USB activity I haven't checked but shows picture no backlight

What is the backlight output voltage?
820-02020 may have similar schematic...
the backlight looks the same as on any macbook. I'll measure and revert
